mapper.select:
select ei.id, ei.order_code, ei.user_code, ei.images, ei.content, ei.schedule_score, ei.service_score, ei.price_score, ei.quality_score, ei.deliver_score, ei.over_score, ei.create_date, ei.merchant_id, ui.name as userName, ui.phone as userPhone, ui.images as userImages, oi.start_address, oi.end_address, mi.name as merchantName, mi.principal, mi.phone as merchantPhone, mi.address from evaluate_info ei left join user_info ui on (ui.code = ei.user_code) left join order_info oi on (oi.code = ei.order_code) left join merchant_info mi on (mi.id = ei.merchant_id) where 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.userName},'%')
AND mi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.merchantName},'%')
AND ci.order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{evaluateInfo.orderCode},'%')
order by ei.create_date desc
